title: Speakers stress on Baloch exiled leaders, militants to hold talks
content:
The seminar organized by the university was titled “Prospering Balochistan with Reconciliation”.The speakers highlighted the steps taken by the provincial government for prosperity of Balochistan.The participants included member provincial assembly Younis Aziz Zehri, Deputy Commissioner Khuzdar Maj (R) Ilyas Kibzai and Dr Jalal Hussain Shah, Registrar Balochistan University of Engineering and Technology. Faculty members of the university, notables and members of civil society attended the event.
